Audio Description: This poster is of a cartoon penguin shivering in the cold with snow on his beak.  The penguin is on an iceberg with a red scarf and a winter hat and a shovel with a few pieces of coal  with the words " Don't Shiver next Winter.... Order Coal NOW!"     Solid Fuels Administration for War, Washington, D.C.
Creator: United States. Solid Fuels Administration for War
Description: Poster, 66 x 47 cm, artist: Egmont Arens
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.

Title: Don't shiver next winter: order coal now!
